figure.figDesc:
Summary of patient characteristics and virological
findings
figure.note:
Virological values as mean ± SEM. P values by Mann-Whitney U test for age
and ALT, t test for virological parameters and Fisher's exact test for gender

c
log 10 copies/cEq (cell equivalent), ALT/Upper Limit of Normal
